root.name: Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue
root.description: Overview102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue is a platformer developed by Crystal Dynamics and published by Eidos Interactive (Dreamcast and Playstation Versions), Activision (Game Boy Color Version), and Disney Interactive (PC Version).Game Boy Color VersionThe Game Boy Color version of Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue is a 2D platforming game. The goal of each level is to collect the key and rescue a set number of dogs from their cages. None of the cages can be opened until after the levels key has been found.There are 17 total levels, with a couple of those being boss fights. At the beginning of the game the player has the option of picking between two puppies, Domino and Oddball.
